entry.title: The Scent of Love (Original)
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,398Chapters: 3/16Kudos: 0

Summary: Sheriff Stilinski decides to sent Stiles on a months long overseas trip. Because his son definitely needs a vacation and a little time out from Beacon Hills.Thanks to Derek, who lives in Venice, Italy, he also has a place to stay.Reluctantly, Stiles agrees to fly to Europe and encounters a somewhat changed Derek Hale.As they share an apartment, they begin to redefine their uneasy friendship and learn to trust each other.With lots of fun and flirty banter, both guys eventually get to know a whole new world of heartbreak, sex and true connection.

entry.title: Don’t Let It Be Real
entry.summary:
Author: ReinstallRay

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,227Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 2

Summary: After Beacon Hills, Stiles thought he knew what nightmares were. Thought he understood losing control—what it meant to question reality.But now something’s hunting him. It stalks him through dreams that bleed into waking, leaves wounds that don’t go away. He’s not sure where he is anymore. Or when. Or if the people around him are even real.The Morrowling doesn’t kill you.It waits until you don’t know who you are anymore—and then it wears your skin.

entry.title: Teen Witch
entry.summary:
Author: AngieNoir

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,054Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 70

Summary: Derek knows that there's something strange about Stiles and that's stirring up trouble in Beacon Hills, drawing the attention of werewolf hunters. Driven to protect his own, he believes he must kill the young witch. Yet, as he watches him, Derek finds himself falling in love, torn between duty and desire. A werewolf. A witch. And a danger that’s impossible to resist.

entry.title: Copain of the black wolf.
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 140,666Chapters: 16/40Kudos: 262

Summary: A Sterek rewrite of the show, that stays mostly canon compliant in the beginning, shown exclusively through the eyes of Stiles Stilinski, unknown soul mate of Derek Hale.Starts slow emotionally, my first attempt at a story of this degree please be gentle.Stiles grunted softly as he heaved himself onto the roof, his sneakers scuffing against the shingles. Scott—his best friend since forever—wasn’t answering his phone, and Stiles couldn’t wait. There was no way Scott was going to believe what Stiles had just overheard.Keeping low, Stiles crept along the roof toward Scott’s window, his heart racing as the cool night air pressed against his skin. He tried the window, but it wouldn’t budge—it was locked.“Of course it’s locked,” he muttered under his breath, rolling his eyes.Knocking softly on the glass, he leaned in closer, squinting to peer inside. The curtains were drawn, giving him only a hazy, distorted view of the room beyond. “Scott,” he hissed, rapping on the window again. No answer.Suddenly, the curtains shifted, and the window flung open. Scott and Stiles screamed, startling each other.

entry.title: Officer Puppy
entry.summary:
Author: Hathly

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,114Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: The man nods once. Doesn’t break stride. Doesn’t smile. Just that stiff, silent acknowledgment like the world’s made of tolerable obstacles and he’s choosing not to bark at them.Stiles blinks.Deputy.Oh. Oh.Well that makes things easier.Not that he was struggling. Please. He could find Officer Puppym on a map, in a nightmare, from memory alone with three broken crayons and a prayer. But now he’s got a job title, a department, and the knowledge that someone in that department is walking around Beacon Hills in government-issued pants with three semi-feral emotional support grenades at his heels.But now he’s got a job title, a department, and the deeply unnerving realization that someone in his dad’s department is walking around Beacon Hills in government-issued pants with three semi-feral emotional support grenades at his heels.Which is fine. Fine. It’s not like Stiles has a type or anything.

entry.title: How to Survive a Hurricane
entry.summary:
Author: Scavengersdaughter2

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 310,131Chapters: 12/26Kudos: 198

Summary: John Stilinski, head of the largest crime syndicate in The States, has passed away. The syndicate is in chaos. The underworld demands more blood. Hale Security is tasked with protecting John's only son, his successor, Stiles, until he can turn 18. A group of wolves to protect a- well, whatever Stiles is. Mafia AU, Bodyguard AU, Supernatural is Known AU. TW: Drug abuse, violence, Stiles=Not HumanAlso featuring oddly protective bees, sensitive crime lords, a team of werewolves who are grossly underpaid for the shit they have to put up with, a Druid godfather who is Having None of This, and two oblivious, damaged idiots in love.CH1:Derek adjusted in his chair, uncomfortable with his ignorance in the language of the tarot cards. "What do you mean 'yikes'?"Stiles continued staring at the card. "It means we're only two cards in and you've drawn the unluckiest card in the deck."Now Isaac was leaning closer, stealing glances. At least Boyd was more subtle with his eavesdropping.Derek ignored them both. "Elaborate.""It means calamity on almost any front- health, finance, romance. It can also mean the ending of pointless commitments and the beginning of a fresh stage in life."

entry.title: Rainbow Pride: Beacon Hills Edition
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 953Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Beacon Hills might be known for supernatural drama and full moon chaos, but on June 1st, the only thing taking over the town is color, celebration, and unapologetic joy.With rainbow flags flying, glitter everywhere, and more queer kisses than Erica can count, the pack comes together for Pride Month in the most Beacon Hills way possible: chaotic, heartfelt, and fiercely supportive.From Stiles and Derek’s (mostly Stiles) over-the-top PDA to Ruby flirting Liam into a blushing mess, from Malia and Kira’s sweet moments to Peter Hale letting someone paint a rainbow on his face (willingly—sort of), this is a day where everyone gets to be loud, proud, and completely themselves.Because love may be messy, complicated, and sometimes involve werewolves—but in Beacon Hills? Love is *always* part of the pack.

entry.summary:
Author: tjjtt

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,745Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 58

Summary: After a breakup, Stiles moves to Lyon, looking for a fresh start. He finds a small apartment on a narrow street where buildings stand almost within arm’s reach. There, he starts to notice his neighbour from across the street.Also there is a murder… but it’s kind of funny tho
